title: Statement by the Press Secretary on S. 1252 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
July 20, 2016

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on S. 1252





On Wednesday, July 20, 2016, the President signed into law:

S. 1252, the “Global Food Security Act of 2016,” which provides authorities to promote global food security, resilience, and nutrition that are consistent with the Feed the Future initiative.
